name: Majoneko
description:
~MAJONEKO~
The evil Queen from the Highlands has kidnapped our prince.
Is your duty to save him!
Become Hikare a witch cat with a magic ball that teleports you whenever it touches the floor.



~A Hard Puzzle Platformer~
Predict trajectories and risk falling to the bottom, Majoneko is a platformer but you cant jump.
You will fall over and over again...



~Climb to the top!~
Go fast or the prince wont be avitable anymore!



~LeaderBoards~
Try to beat your times and get into the top 10 in the Hall Of Fame.
